author: busssard
title: A portal to audit and release funds
description: There is no platform to audit projects in an easy way while seeing what stage of the proposal they are in. Lets make it simple and fair!
solution: Proposal is split into work blocks with req. ADA, once finished community/smart contract confirms if next funding is unlocked.
experience: I am an Engineer from ETHZ, Entrepreneur and have experience with how funding is unlocked in traditional settings.
